title.rendered: Your Weekly Wrap – Top Posts You Might Have Missed this week

content.rendered:
Hi There Woo-Hoo it’s the weekend! The phrase “weekend is here” brings a lot of pleasure with it. The much awaited days of the week are finally here. Even if you like your job, the weekend still holds a special charisma for every person. It’s your personal time off, where you are liberated to explore anything. And to make your weekend even better & bigger, here we bring the weekly wrap of hand-picked pleasurable stuff that you don’t want to miss. Here’s your shortcut key to the most recent marketing news & updates, tricks & techniques and the upcoming trends. Take a look!

1. Latest Twitter Update

 
Twitter Is Going To Limit The Visibility Of Tweets Based On User Behavior
Recently, Twitter has announced a massive change in its content (tweet) policies with an attempt to improve the conversational health of the platform. As per Twitter, the motive behind this new initiative is to modify the way conversations generally happen on the platform; based on the actual behavior content and conduct of users of their tweets. Read more

2. Digiperform in Media

 
‘Think Before You Tweet’ – Vaibhav Vats
The prominent publication – Mail Today – has featured Digiperform in its weekly education supplement- Education Mail, on 22nd May in its print edition. The publication has carried authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-founder of Digiperform, on “How to create a strong and appealing social media profile for potential recruiters” under the headline section ‘Think Before You Tweet‘. Read more
How Platforms Like Digiperform Are Helping Entrepreneurs Enhance Their Businesses
The prominent online publications portal like Business Standard, Outlook India, Yahoo, ANI, India News, The Siasat Daily, etc. have featured Digiperform in industry story on ‘4 platforms for helping Entrepreneurs/SME’ enhance their businesses’. The article highlights 4 platforms that help entrepreneurs/SME’ to enhance and grow their business, published on 24th May 2018. Read more

3. Student Testimonials

 
“Digiperform Is The Most Trusted Brand In Digital Education For Relevant Learning.” – Hiteshi Malhotra
Meet Digiperformer Hiteshi Malhotra, presently handling the Marketing & Communication Department of a German MNC “Giesecke & Devrient”. In a chit-chat session, she shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped her to upgrade her existing marketing skills to grab bigger opportunities. Read more
“Digiperform Is Like A Best Friend For Wannabe Digital Marketer” – Mansi Yadav
Meet Digiperformer Mansi Yadav, BBA graduate from GGSIPU and currently working on various projects as a Freelancer. After graduation, she realized the importance of digital marketing and decided to learn the same. In a chit-chat session, she shared why she decided to learn digital marketing and choose dCDMC training at Digiperform.  Read more

4. Content Marketing Growth Hacks

 
10 Content Marketing Growth Hacks That Will Double Your Traffic
We have seen startups making giant space in the market and reaching millions of users so quickly. So, how do these startups do it? What types of marketing strategies do they incorporate to overcome the challenges? Definitely, they follow a Growth Hacking framework. It can help you to achieve the right traffic with genuine users. And in this article, we’ll focus exclusively on Content Marketing Growth Hacks to double your website traffic.  dCDMC training at Digiperform. We hope this makes your day more positive and productive. Stay Tuned!
